useCase.name: Create Report Definitions

preconditions.precondition: UI is able to access Reporting Dashboards

useCase.trigger: UI triggers the creation or update of Report Definitions

mainSequence.step: UI creates or updates Report Definitions by providing UX information
Reporting Dashboards retrieves available Notification Feature Channel list
Notifications OpenSearch Plugin responds with the Notification Feature Channel list
Reporting Dashboards provides UX information with the available Channel list for reporting feature
Reporting Dashboards saves the Report Definition
Reporting OpenSearch saves the Report Definition
Reporting Dashboards confirms the successful saving of the Report Definition
